ACu.caption: Data
ACu.doc: What to encode into the QR Code (should be a URL). For example: google.com
ACu.name: data

ACy.caption: logo data
ACy.doc: THIS SHOULD BE THE "Result of Step X get a logo for an advanced QR code (CORS workaround)'s logo data"
ACy.name: logo_uri

AEU.caption: The barcode is always generated on the page and as a base64 URI, but if you prefer to also upload it to the file manager, input the settings below.
AEU.name: info

AEZ.caption: By default, the QR Code is rendered on the screen the same size as the element. However, you may use the options below to override its size. WARNING: the QR Code will not render in its element if you override the size; you will need to display its output as an image and should resize this element to 1 px by 1 px.
AEZ.name: size_override

AEa.caption: override size
AEa.doc: Whether or not to override the size.
AEa.name: override_size

AEb.caption: size
AEb.doc: The number of pixels to render the code (note that size = length = width). Required if the box above is checked.
AEb.name: size
